sources.title: 1936 Engel Mit Kleinen Fehlern ( Ralph Arthur Roberts, Adele Sandrock, Curt Vespermann, Grethe Weiser, Paul Westermeier)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1936. Engel mit kleinen Fehlern.  U.a mit Ralph Arthur Roberts,Grethe Weiser und Adele Sandrock

metadata.Plot: Mary arrives in Berlin from Canada to visit her nephew Max and meet his twin daughters that she has been amply supporting financially. But Max has cheated: There is only one daughter Inge who has to enact both girls to cover up th...
metadata.Actors: Charlott Daudert, Ralph Arthur Roberts, Adele Sandrock
